sentences.english: In 1272, Dadu officially became the capital of the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在1272年，正式成爲大渡河首都元代。

sentences.english: Platform is surrounded by banks of the Dadu River from the date from the red granite thorough.
sentences.chinese: 臺基四周是用來自大渡河畔的棗紅色花崗石徹起。

sentences.english: We have to cross the river by boat.
The Red Army forced the Tadu River.
Many of them drowned as they tried to cross a river.
sentences.chinese: 許多人在試圖穿渡河時被淹死。

sentences.english: Grant then ordered the rest of his army to cross to the east side of the river. Some of his officers protested.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭特隨後命令他的其餘部隊全部渡河到東岸去。

sentences.english: If you are afraid to cross water, swim.
sentences.chinese: 如果你害怕渡河，游泳游過去。

sentences.english: Very soon the boat was rowed over to ferry them all.
sentences.chinese: 不久，那艘渡船就划過來，載他們渡河去。

sentences.english: Dai Jinhua rate team first river crossing, matt to send some difficulty there.
sentences.chinese: 戴金花率隊先行渡河，馬特派員那裏有些困難。

sentences.english: But scores of others from surrounding villages must negotiate the river.
sentences.chinese: 可是大量來自四周村莊，必須渡河。

sentences.english: He destroyed all the rafts after his men had crossed the stream.
sentences.chinese: 在他的軍隊渡河之後，他命人破壞了所有的船筏。

sentences.english: The locals use a man-made cable car. It's so risky.
sentences.chinese: 當地人使用一臺人工纜車渡河，這是非常冒險的事。

sentences.english: It was rumored the Japanese at the river had already brought up parachutists and amphibious units for a crossing.
sentences.chinese: 傳聞說日軍已經集結了空降兵和陸戰隊準備渡河。

sentences.english: A stream was winding its way through the valley in into the Dadu river.
sentences.chinese: 一彎溪水蜿蜒流過山谷，匯合到大渡河去了。

sentences.english: He kindly offered to carry her over, and his offer was accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他好心地表示願意揹她渡河，而她也接受這番好意。

sentences.english: We crossed over the river into Sweden.

definition: to camp/to pitch camp/stationed/quartered/Taiwan pr. [zha2 ying2]
